question: Which among the following is incorrect regarding Kushanas?
option2: They were derivative of Yuezhi tribe
option3: The Ancestors of Kushanas were easternmost speakers of Indo-Greek languages
answer: The Ancestors of Kushanas were easternmost speakers of Indo-Greek languages
explanation: As per the Chinese sources, the Kushanas (mentioned in Chinese texts as Guishuang) were one of the 5 tribes of Yueh-Chi or Yuezhi. Kushanas were also known as Tocharians. They were nomadic tribes and easternmost speakers of the Indo-Europeans Languages which were called “Tocharian languages”.
